page.description: Set the offset to the first character of the specified line, returns offset (returns 0 if line number doesn't exist).
page.syntax: Offset as N = GotoLineStart as N(lineNumber as N)

argument.name: Offset
argument.description: A new scanner object that supports operations against Text.

argument.name: lineNumber
argument.description: The text that you want to process

page.discussion: The <StringScanner>.GotoLineStart() function sets the offset to the beginning of the specified line and returns the offset value.
page.example: dim scanner as StringScanner dim txt as C txt = <<%text% This is line one and this is line two and finally line three %text% scanner = stringscanner.Create(txt) ? scanner.GotoLineStart(3) = 40
